helpgrid.innerhtml: Onderstaand de PO-acties die door voorgaande PO’s in de ‘ketting’ zijn of worden uitgevoerd.

table.label: Structural ROTs on Master PM or CM Item

multiparttextbox.label: Job plan - Time Based Frequency Iterations
Job plan - Meter Based Frequency Iterations

helpgrid.innerhtml: Enter a new value for Reading at last Work Order either to establish a starting point for a new PM on an existing asset or to reset the schedule on a PM.
This action shows the projected order of job plan use on work orders generated from the current PM.
Enter the period of time for which to forecast preventive maintenance records. The forecast can be run in the background. Forecasted dates will appear on the Forecast tab.

statictext.label: NOTE: If reforecast is pending, forecast dates will be adjusted appropriately when this action is executed.

helpgrid.innerhtml: Enter the period of time for which to forecast preventive maintenance records. The forecast can be run in the background. Forecasted dates will appear on the Forecast tab.

statictext.label: NOTE: If reforecast is pending, forecast dates will be adjusted appropriately when this action is executed.

helpgrid.innerhtml: Displays summary of action hierarchy. Note that it is possible that actions displayed here may not have been created using 'Create Associated Actions' yet.
Select the checkbox for each row containing the asset or location that needs PMs created for them. To create associated PMs, click OK.
Enter a comment for extending the date. Click OK when finished.

helpgrid.innerhtml: Voer een nieuwe waarde in voor de laatste voltooide telling om een ​​startpunt voor een nieuwe PM op een bestaand activum vast te stellen of om het schema op een PM te resetten.
